recipes.author: Maangchi
recipes.description: Super-spicy chicken tempered with loads of cheese and fresh spring onions. Serve with rice and a light salad – or, better yet, an assortment of side dishes.
recipes.title: Cheese Buldak

recipes.description: Perilla leaves, stuffed with a pork-based filling, then eggwashed and fried.
recipes.title: Pan-Fried Perilla Leaves
